Description: You strike out with a devastating punch. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing normal damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target becomes confused. At level 17, a natural attack roll of 17 or more confuses the target.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
